summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Mary E. Erdoes, and Jes Staley discussing a proposal related to financial arrangements involving a donor-advised fund (DAF). Epstein suggests a structure for engaging an entity to manage profits related to the DAF and mentions his willingness to cover costs. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
